mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD VALUES ( seq_freeboard_no.nextval, #{cateNo}, 1, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 'N', SYSDATE, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FREE_BOARD FB JOIN ( SELECT BOARD_NO, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'L' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LIKES, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'H' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS HATES FROM FREE_BOARD_LIKE_HATE GROUP BY BOARD_NO) FLH ON FB.NO = FLH.BOARD_NO JOIN (SELECT NO, ID, NICK WRITER_NICK, IMG_PATH WRITER_IMG FROM MEMBER) M ON FB.WRITER = M.NO ORDER BY FB.NO

SELECT * FROM FREE_BOARD FB JOIN ( SELECT BOARD_NO, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'L' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LIKES, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'H' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS HATES FROM FREE_BOARD_LIKE_HATE GROUP BY BOARD_NO) FLH ON FB.NO = FLH.BOARD_NO JOIN (SELECT NO, ID, NICK WRITER_NICK, IMG_PATH WRITER_IMG FROM MEMBER) M ON FB.WRITER = M.NO WHERE FB.NO = #{bno} ORDER BY FB.NO
